articles.title: Opinion: Every few seconds, a girl’s genitals are cut in Africa. I was one of those girls | CNN
articles.description: Leyla Hussein recounts the horrifying moment when, as a seven-year-old girl in Somalia, she experienced Female Genital Mutilation (FGM). Now a therapist, Hussein helps other survivors – and has advice on how to end this heinous crime.
articles.content: Editors Note: Leyla Hussein is a psychotherapist specialising in supporters of sexual abuse. She is the founder of The Dahlia Project, the UKs first specialist therapeutic service for female genital … [+8473 chars]
